predicate: The BWP-Id in initialdownlinkbwp_pdsch-config must match the BWP-Id in nzp-csi-rs-resourcetoaddmodlist

valid: BWP-Id in initialdownlinkbwp_pdsch-config is 1 and BWP-Id in nzp-csi-rs-resourcetoaddmodlist is 1
invalid: BWP-Id in initialdownlinkbwp_pdsch-config is 1 and BWP-Id in nzp-csi-rs-resourcetoaddmodlist is 2

notes: The evidence explicitly states that the BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig (which is part of nzp-csi-rs-resourcetoaddmodlist) defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS is located in. This implies a match with the BWP-Id in initialdownlinkbwp_pdsch-config.

meta.evidence: - powerControlOffsetSS: which is the assumed ratio of NZP CSI-RS EPRE to SS/PBCH block EPRE. - scramblingID defines scrambling ID of CSI-RS with length of 10 bits. - BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS is located in.
